ygData.subject: Stupid partners
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in BB recently with 3 mates - 2 rangers and a warrior. We agreed to take on a gnoll commander and to make sure no one died, right? So we thump the comm
ygData.messageBody:
I was in BB recently with 3 mates - 2 rangers and
a warrior. We agreed to take on a gnoll commander
and to make sure no one died, right? So we thump the
comm enough to where he runs. The others were getting
pounded, so I taunted him and received much damage.
Anyway, he ran away, and when he did we ran into 3 gnolls
who decided to kill me. Everyone else lived but me.
No one taunted to help, no one healed me. Very lame.
Those of you out there with healing spells - use them!
We warriors are strong, but not powerful enough to
fight death and need the assistance of healing spells
frequently.<br><br>Iskandar<br>Half-Elf warrior of 9 seasons<br>Prexus
